Port binding for the docker container "exposed:internal" like "8081:8080"

https://www.sodalite.eu/ontologies/works.description: Alias name for docker container
Exposed ports of the container like "8081"
The name of the image on the host
A list of mounted volumes for the docker container "host_path:container_path" like "/tmp/docker:/tmp"
Restart policy [no, on-failure, always, unless-stopped]
Map for docker enviroment variables key-value dictionary

https://www.sodalite.eu/ontologies/tosca.description: Reflects the name of the Node Template as defined in the TOSCA service template. This name is not unique to the realized instance model of corresponding deployed application as each template in the model can result in one or more instances (e.g., scaled) when orchestrated to a provider environment.
A unique identifier of the realized instance of a Node Template that derives from any TOSCA normative type
The state of the node instance.

https://www.sodalite.eu/ontologies/works.description: Username for SSH connection
Name of floating IP pool from which to choose a floating IP

Reflects the name of the Node Template as defined in the TOSCA service template. This name is not unique to the realized instance model of corresponding deployed application as each template in the model can result in one or more instances (e.g., scaled) when orchestrated to a provider environment.
The primary private IP address assigned by the cloud provider that applications may use to access the Compute node.
The state of the node instance.
The primary public IP address assigned by the cloud provider that applications may use to access the Compute node.
